赤菱: (あかびし) - Red Crystal (politically and religiously neutral emblem used by the International Committee of the Red Cross)

赤蛙: (アカガエル) - any brown or reddish-brown frog (esp. of family Ranidae); Japanese brown frog (Rana japonica)/brown frog
赤蜱: (アカダニ) - spider mite (any mite of family Tetranychidae)
